comment.content: 계속 기르세요! 중년의 기품이(dignity) 느껴질 것 같습니다.

post.content:
Some of you know I've started growing the beard not mustache. I like it. I suppose it is every man's dream have a great looking set of mustache and beard. I had tried the mustache. i did not have enough density. I tried for about 5 days. It looked awful. It is the first time I am doing the beard. I like it very much. I did not have the plan to do it. It just happened. About 10 days ago I usually do not shave over the weekend. In Monday morning I started shaving after I'd done with whiskers (sideburns)and under the nose parts. Then I looked at myself at the mirror I liked it. I had decided to keep it for a while.
There are the three different reactions by the demography by age and sex.
Male : No reactions Everybody tried at least in their adult life. I got odd comments like "When are you going to shave it ?", "You need the fertilizer.", "There are few gray hairs." Not bad At least they are not against it.
Female under early 30 : No comments or they like it. Some told me I looked tough. That was I was looking for
Female over early 30 : They do not like a bit. They want me to shave it this instance.
My wife : Looks dirty but she will survive. She had been through a lot worse.
My Daughter : Looks dirty but it is father's face not hers
Thomas : He likes it very much even though some odd times he wish there are more population of facial hairs. But it is better than a lot of other guys. At least I have some and looks O.K..
I have decided to keep it for at least another two more weeks. My opinion counts the most, isn't it.
If anyone of you do not like, go to hell and don't come back. Those people like my beard. Please add nice comments.
la'vie en rose : Life is beautiful when you are trying something stupid and enjoying it.
post.title: My Beard
